titleStmt.title: A philologicall commentary, or, An illustration of the most obvious and useful words in the lavv with their distinctions and divers acceptations, as they are found as well in reports antient and modern as in records and memorials never printed : usefull for all young students of the law / by Edward Leigh ...
titleStmt.author: Leigh, Edward, 1602-1671.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition reviewed and inlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Charles Adams, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: The author's name appears after the edition statement.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Signature A8 is lacking in filmed copy. Pages from beginning-15 photographed from British Library copy and inserted at end.
